description: Transform your e-books into audiobooks with customizable voices, automatic chapter organization, and professional-quality audio output that works on any device.
convert-epub-e-books-into-audio-using-oo: Convert EPUB e-books into audio using OOMOL TTS. Extracts chapters, converts each chapter to speech, and optionally merges into an M4B audiobook with chapter navigation.
path-to-the-epub-file-to-convert: Path to the EPUB file to convert
output-filename-without-extension-option: Output filename without extension (optional, default: audiobook)
merge-all-chapters-into-a-single-m4b-aud: Merge all chapters into a single M4B audiobook (optional, default: true)
maximum-text-length-per-tts-request-in-c: Maximum text length per TTS request in characters (optional, default: 500)
path-to-the-generated-audiobook-file: Path to the generated audiobook file
